word:
In leaning upon man--placing so many responsibilities upon one man, as though God had not given intelligence of reason and spiritual strength to 
                                                                           358
other men to bear responsibilities--there is not only danger that they themselves will become weak and inefficient, but they do a serious wrong to the one whom they treat in this manner, Human beings cannot endure this dependence placed upon themselves. Their danger is great that human influence will stand where the Lord should be.
